patthana15.24:1.1_0: Hetusampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.24:2.1_0: Hetusampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana15.24:3.1_0: Hetuvippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nahetuvippayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi,
